```{r setup}
library(webmorph)
library(geomorph)
```


## Load a directory of templates
```{r}
path <- system.file("extdata/composite/", package = "webmorph")
temlist <- read_tem(path, images = FALSE)
```

## Save as TPS and read from TPS

```{r}
path_to_tps <- tempfile(fileext = ".tps")
write_tps(temlist, path_to_tps)
gm_data <- readland.tps(path_to_tps, specID = "ID")

plotAllSpecimens(gm_data)
```

## Or, just get from temlist

```{r}
wm_data <- tems_to_array(temlist)

plotAllSpecimens(wm_data)
```
